summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BharatBazaar e-commerce platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but critical frontend issues found with admin dashboard access due to JavaScript runtime errors.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime errors preventing admin dashboard from loading
ui_bugs.error_details: Failed to construct 'Image': Please use the 'new' operator, this DOM object constructor cannot be called as a function

ui_bugs.issue: No visible admin access links in the main navigation for logged-in admin users

integration_issues.issue: Admin login works but dashboard fails to render due to JavaScript errors

passed_tests: Homepage loads with banners, categories, products
Login page with phone/password authentication works
All backend API endpoints (17/17 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix JavaScript runtime errors in admin dashboard. The error 'Failed to construct Image' suggests an issue with image handling in React components. Admin dashboard is completely inaccessible due to these errors. Also add visible admin navigation links for logged-in admin users.
